get.description: Allows you to search for companies in the system. You can filter the search using query parameters, and the search will return companies that match the specified criteria.

200.description: The list of companies was successfully retrieved.

403.description: Forbidden. Missing authentication credentials or invalid API key.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An unexpected error occurred on the server.

post.description: Creates a new company in the system with the provided details.

201.description: Created. The company was successfully created.

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid data has been provided.

403.description: Forbidden. Missing authentication credentials or invalid API key.

409.description: Conflict. A company with this domain already exists for this client.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An unexpected error occurred on the server.

get.description: Allows you to search for companies in the system - across all clients. You can filter the search using query parameters, and the search will return companies that match the specified criteria. The response limit is 100 companies

200.description: The list of companies was successfully retrieved.

403.description: Forbidden. Missing authentication credentials or invalid API key.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An unexpected error occurred on the server.

get.description: Retrieves details of a specific company by its unique identifier.

200.description: OK. The company was successfully retrieved.

401.description: Unauthorized. API KEY not authorized to access this client_id.

403.description: Forbidden. Missing authentication credentials or invalid API key.

404.description: Not Found. Company with this ID does not exist.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An unexpected error occurred on the server.

200.description: OK. The company was successfully retrieved.

401.description: Unauthorized. API KEY not authorized to access this client_id.

403.description: Forbidden. Missing authentication credentials or invalid API key.

patch.description: Updates the details of an existing company using its unique identifier.

200.description: OK. The company was successfully updated.

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid data has been provided.

401.description: Unauthorized. Company does not belong to this client.

403.description: Forbidden. Missing authentication credentials or invalid API key.

404.description: Not Found. Company with this ID does not exist.

409.description: Conflict. A company with this domain already exists for this client.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An unexpected error occurred on the server.

delete.description: Deletes a specific company from the system using its unique identifier.

200.description: OK. The company was successfully deleted.

401.description: Unauthorized. The company does not belong to the authenticated client's API key.

403.description: Forbidden. Missing authentication credentials or invalid API key.

404.description: Not Found. No company with the specified ID exists.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An unexpected error occurred on the server.

post.description: Adds a custom field to a specific company.

201.description: Created. The custom field was successfully created.

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid data has been provided.

401.description: Unauthorized. Company does not belong to this client.

403.description: Forbidden. Missing authentication credentials or invalid API key.

404.description: Not Found. Company with this ID does not exist.

409.description: Conflict. A custom field with this name already exists for this company.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An unexpected error occurred on the server.

patch.description: Updates the value of an existing custom field for a specific company.

200.description: OK. The custom field was successfully updated.

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid data has been provided.

401.description: Unauthorized. Company does not belong to this client.

403.description: Forbidden. Missing authentication credentials or invalid API key.

404.description: Not Found. Company with this ID does not exist.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An unexpected error occurred on the server.

delete.description: Removes a custom field from a specific company.

200.description: OK. The custom field was successfully deleted.

401.description: Unauthorized. Company does not belong to this client.

403.description: Forbidden. Missing authentication credentials or invalid API key.

404.description: Not Found. Company with this ID does not exist or the field does not belong to this company.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An unexpected error occurred on the server.

get.description: Allows you to search for contacts within the system. You can filter the search using query parameters, and the search will return contacts that match the provided criteria. The response limit is 100 contacts

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: Filter for contacts with companies matching to a domain (excludes contacts without companies)

401.description: Unauthorized. The contact does not belong to the authenticated client's API key.

403.description: Forbidden. Missing authentication credentials or invalid API key.

404.description: No contact with the specified ID exists.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An unexpected error occurred on the server.

post.description: Creates a new contact. company_id accepts an integer ID or a domain string to auto-resolve the company. Returns the created contact on success.

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid or missing fields.

401.description: Unauthorized. Company does not belong to this client.

403.description: Forbidden. Missing authentication credentials or invalid API key.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An unexpected error occurred on the server.

parameters.description: Format of custom fields in response. NESTED returns array of objects with id, field_name, field_value. FLAT returns object with field names as keys.
